body: Oh boy, this one is gonna be a long one
I like how squishy she's drawn
Current chapter "Mister Apothecary...You saved my life." - My devilish thought after reading this: "But not her virginity, lol".

Seeing how appalling her condition was at the start of the 'main' manga, this will only get worse from here. 

I genuinely hope the author won't disappoint on showing us the horrific rapes this poor elf will be subjected into.
Just how many times this got reposted XD

you guys've seen the original manga right? at first we meet the elf in that ragged condition so it should be expected for the elf to have a gone through torture, rape, etc in the past. so why tf are you guys mad at something that's already happened, jeez these people
Hope the man who help her later find them and kill them..

this guy doesn't know that he keeps hurting his other work with this to the point most people will drop his manga if this keep going 
this is nothing but disgusting work

I asked myself: Why would the author of a sentimental fantasy drama produce such a prequel, what use does it has? I read the more current ones from the main series and than I got an idea. What if the talk between her and the doctor, was not only about her sexual organs being damaged but also about her having given birth? Yes, she had a rape baby and this prequel is here so that we can see the making and birth of her rape baby! You think the rape is shocking, just wait than we have a shocking impregnation panel! And the next part of the main story will be about finding her rape baby and her challenge to accept it, after those horrors.----This or the author is just on a kinky wako trip.
Another one? Bruh I just wish this wasn't the prequel..
Ah I see, I think the artist is not gonna full out on the more guro aspects later on as he slightly censored the ear ripping scene
